title: Drawing, "Theology, after Raphael Sansio, Stanza della Segnatura, Vatican", ca. 1820
medium: Pen and dark brown ink, brush and sepia wash over traces of graphite on off white laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Theology, after Raphael Sansio, Stanza della Segnatura, Vatican", ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. Pen and dark brown ink, brush and sepia wash over traces of graphite on off white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-75.
